0.text: Arjuna: Oh, really? When did dinosaurs come into the world?
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Arjuna: Oh, really? When did dinosaurs come into the world?</prosody></speak>

1.text: Radhika: Dinosaurs appeared much later. Amphibians and reptiles
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Radhika: Dinosaurs appeared much later. Amphibians and reptiles</prosody></speak>

2.text: were there before them, but birds and mammals came later.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>were there before them, but birds and mammals came later.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Radhika: Humans appeared on Earth last. Some scientists believe
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Radhika: Humans appeared on Earth last. Some scientists believe</prosody></speak>

5.text: that humans evolved from apes. Early humans hunted and gathered food. Later, they learnt to make tools and to use fire.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>that humans evolved from apes. Early humans hunted and gathered food. Later, they learnt to make tools and to use fire.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Arjuna: What happened to the dinosaurs?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Arjuna: What happened to the dinosaurs?</prosody></speak>

7.text: Radhika: Why don't you find it out yourself? I have a book and a DVD
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Radhika: Why don't you find it out yourself? I have a book and a DVD</prosody></speak>

8.text: on dinosaurs. You can read the book or watch the DVD.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>on dinosaurs. You can read the book or watch the DVD.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Read the conversation and complete the flow chart.
